_meta.description: A11y test manifest - defines which examples to test for color contrast
_meta.howToUse: Review this file, adjust 'test' flags as needed, then run tests

examples.title: Stats Card
examples.reason: Uses adaptive text-wex-text-success for dark mode

examples.title: Pie Chart
examples.reason: Skip - Recharts SVG library (not WEX component)

examples.title: With Status Badges
examples.reason: Skip - badges are tested separately on BadgePage

examples.title: Closable Tabs
examples.reason: Skip - closable tabs use buttons inside tablist which violates aria-required-children
